official_title: A bill to provide for the reauthorization of the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972, and for other purposes.
short_title: Coastal Zone Management Reauthorization Act of 1985

summary.text: Coastal Zone Management Reauthorization Act of 1985 - Amends the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972 to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to make grants to coastal States for 80 percent of the administrative costs of a State's coastal zone management program. (Currently such grants may be made for up to 80 percent of such costs.) Extends through FY 1993 the authorization of appropriations for the making of various coastal zone management grants under such Act.

titles.title: Coastal Zone Management Reauthorization Act of 1985
A bill to provide for the reauthorization of the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972, and for other purposes.
